content.prompt: The “recent book-club guides” (end of paragraph 2) tend to emphasize

choices.label: how book clubs need to be structured and regular in order to succeed
how difficult it is to start a book club in New York
how often even the best book clubs fail
the variety of reasons that people have for starting book clubs

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
